Studying the battle Phobia spots the retreat. "Computer set 
targetting for Hell Beast, weapons on 110%" 
An immediate response came from the computer, override, 110% will 
cause permanent damage to this ship."
"Oh well, It probably would've just pissed him off anyways.", he 
looks at the form of HellBeast in his sights, "One of these days 
Beast, Bang you're scrap."

With his babies in place he'd be sure to get his message 
through.  "Now lets see what Magmatrons up to." "Computer, playback 
transmissions from Destron Babies," he sits back and begins to see 
whats transpired in his absence.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::The Cybertronian Fire/Rex/Kluster/Striker/Ramulus/Smokescreen::
> 
> Ares' shots hit the shields of the Cybertronian Fire, this time 
regestering 
> on the energy readings, but not nearly enough to even cause the 
shields to 
> falter. A missile launcher takes aim at Ares, firing two signature-
seeking 
> missiles.
> 
> The laser batteries swirl around to fire at Hades and Ares, the EMP 
cannons, 
> once again recharged, firing at Anubis.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Rex laughs as he sees Hell Beast retreat. He runs after the 
Predacon 
> commander for a while.
> 
> "And don't come back, coward!" Rex yells loudly enough for Hell 
Beast to 
> hear, then turns around to return to the ship.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster looks from the running Predacons to his ship, leaughing 
> good-heartedly as he fires at Koga.
> 
> "Ha!" he says into his comm-link, sending the message to all 
Maximals and 
> Predacons, "Three attacks and they couldn't even scratch the ship!"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker smiles as he sees the Predacons run.
> 
> "Good battle, eh, Hell Beast?" he says into his comm, sending the 
> transmission to the Predacon commander, "Too bad you couldn't stay 
longer."
> 
> With that, he turns to fire at Ares.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> "Maximal victory!" Ramulus yells as he sees Hell Beast retreat. He 
smiles, 
> turning to fire at Anubis.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen's eyes widen as he sees Hell Beast and the Preds run. 
Another 
> Maximal victory! He turns around to walk toward the ship. He was 
pretty 
> damaged, so he headed toward the CR chambers.
